MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 18-NOV-2020 16:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL23 postcode area of Bala affecting a number of properties in the local area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2pm in order to carry out repair work in safety on the overhead line network following a bird strike , and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:35pm on the 18th November 2020.
